about_the_game:
Add CA2S: Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

The Darkstalkers are earth's last defense against Pyron, the ultimate life form. As the fierce battle rages, two new challengers join the fray—hunters hell-bent on destroying the Darkstalkers and extinguishing evil.
Reawakened, the true power of darkness emerges!

Players: 1-2 Player VS
Genre: Fighting
Versions: Japanese & English

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended

short_description: Add CA2S: Night Warriors: Darkstalkers' Revenge to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up! The Darkstalkers are earth's last defense against Pyron, the ultimate life form. As the fierce battle rages, two new challengers join the fray—hunters hell-bent on destroying the Darkstalkers and extinguishing evil.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese
